content.prompt: According to the sector model of North American city structure, members of low-income groups tend to live in which of the following places?

choices.label: Linear residential areas radiating from the center city outward

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
